summary: I am Magento develop since 2012 with both experience with M1 and M2. I strive to build great Magento website with custom features from basic to advance and can take an initial idea, tackle it from multiple angles and take it from basic stuff to something big. With 7 years of experience in just Magento development industry, I help e-commerce agency and store owner from idea phase to become the real stuff. I take design or idea and making out solutions, implement internal processes that fit your organization i.e coding review or doing technical supporting another team member , providing great result with great work.

experience.description: Extension Department. I am working as maintainer for the company modules such as Xpos or Multi-vendor solution. I also involve into development phase of Magento projects of company clients

Juno is a great team locate on Nottingham of the UK where I have chance working with them as senior developer - remotely. I involveed into development of company clients most of them are Magento 1 both CE and EE version, I involved into early steps of some Magento 2 build from scratch, including investigate on giving solution
I am doing freelancing on Upwork, doing jobs like Magento customization or Fixing bug on the site. I am open for basic request to complex build

projects.name: Magento payment method - paylands.com
projects.description: Payland is the payment gateway highly use by south america. The module enable customer to pay through that payment gateway

projects.name: Magento 2 development - Mobelaris
projects.description: Mobelaris is a furtunite brand on UK which sell their products to all euro. I handle all development for them both backend / frontend. Working on optimazation, making git flow for the team, doing coding view and help other team member with technical solution
